title: Vision. [No. 27]
creator_credit: Sidney R Aronson, SA Films and United States Information Agency
brief_description: Cinemagazine: Senior softball - a softball league whose players are all 75 years of age or older; Busch Gardens - where people enjoy riding, animal shows etc; Hamburger University - the school training thoe who operate McDonald’s restaurants; house-on-the rocks - a ‘castle in the sky’ perched on top of a rugged 450 foot high chimney rock; Harpers Ferry - John Sergem, wood carver, creates plaques, busts and other exhibits for display in national parks; Eva Jessye - one of the great names in Black American music.
creator_credit_for_label: Sidney R Aronson, SA Films and United States Information Agency
